column5: After a tough couple days at work Randy an I were stoked to get out this morning to try our luck on the "Lady". Randy met me at my house and we loaded up and headed to BBP. We launched off of the end of BBP Rd at around 7:45am and set up at our first spot at around 8:10am. Travel via ATV was ok......deep snow and many slush beds slowed us down but never really caused any problems. We marked fish all day and had lots of chasers during the day but never really found any fish that were willing to commit. We probably moved 6 times during the day. Randy lost one laker at the hole.......his swivel bent apart!! Arrghh.  I think we lost 2 or 3 others on the way up and we were getting a little discouraged. We made one final move later in the day which turned our to be a good one for me as I landed my PB laker within about 15 mins of setting up. Randy got the assist on it by doing a text-book landing. The laker went 19.3lbs on my scale. Although it didn't have the length, the girth made up for it. It was a real porker.  ......and of course it was safely released to swim and spawn for many more years to come.  ...and the battle begins.   ...the porker.   I took this one for Todd so he could see I wasn't telling stories! LOL   I'll be out tomorrow looking for more!  Colin
Sweet Laker!  Love the contrast in the photos as well! Great pics!
Awesome Laker bud!!....I'll take one of those "tough" days anytime!!...congrats
Nice job.  I love the action shots.  Beauty fish.
nice going..... it was slow/dead fishing all day  I was out in the same area today
Does that read 19+? Nice day to be out no dought.
It says 19.3. It was a tough but great day to be out. Not toooooo cold out and no wind always helps.
beauty for sure  ... nice job
it's a beaut! what did you get it on?
Very cool zoom effect!
It fell victim to the white tube. It was hanging onto 1 hook of the stinger I attached.
it was for those that need to up grade their eyeglass prescription but hasn't done it yet  LOL
Aw thats better. TY  Great fish.   I really need to tell my boss to frig off.
Thanks Terry   Tracker (Don)
Terry Sweet reward for your efforts ckrb2007    Congrats Leechman
Great another photoshopped fishing picture. Didn't you think we would catch you???  :blahblah1:     Art
Beauty laker there.  Looks like a nice day out.  1 is better than none!
Nice fish!!  Was she clipped?!  Looks like a wild fish..  We'll be in that area tomorrow.  I'd love to catch one like that!!  cheers HD
It was a clipped fish...I'm just doing some research as we speak to try to figure out when it was stocked.
A very nice lake trout, well done. I'm starting to get itchy.
That's awesome!
